1.verse: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.

2.verse: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

3.verse: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

4.verse: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.

5.verse: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

6.verse: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

7.verse: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.

8.verse: For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.

9.verse: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
